article_title: Kamala Harris says 'too many' civilian deaths in Gaza
sentence: More  than  70  people  were  killed  at  the  building  which  sheltered  displaced  Palestinians,  the  director  of  a  hospital  has  told  the  BBC.

article_title: Kamala Harris says 'too many' civilian deaths in Gaza
sentence: Ms  Harris  said  "far  too  many"  civilians  had  been  killed  "yet  again"and  reiterated  calls  for  a  hostage  deal  and  a  ceasefire,  echoing  comments  made  by  the  White  House.

article_title: Kamala Harris says 'too many' civilian deaths in Gaza
sentence: Hamas-led  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  in  an  attack  on  Israel  on  7  October,  taking  251  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Kamala Harris says 'too many' civilian deaths in Gaza
sentence: More  than  39,790  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  the  Israeli  campaign,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
